alert.note: Alert for Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN MADISON...EAST CENTRAL LIMESTONE...SOUTHEASTERN MOORE AND LINCOLN COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM CST... At 830 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fayetteville to near Harvest. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30-40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Huntsville, Fayetteville, Lynchburg, Meridianville, Moores Mill, Hazel Green, Harvest, New Market, Tims Ford Lake, and Lincoln. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for north central Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
